"At 24 years old, Joss Stone has already sold over 11 million albums and established herself as an amazing artist and uniquely talented songwriter. We're proud to be globally working with her as she launches several exciting new projects," said Willard Ahdritz, CEO and Founder of Kobalt Music Group.
 
In addition to the solo album, Kobalt will represent the works Stone has also co-written for the highly-anticipated album by Superheavy, the supergroup founded by Mick Jagger and Dave Stewart. Alongside Jagger, Stewart, A.R. Rahman and Damian Marley, Stone performs in the supergroup.
 
Kobalt's global synch and creative teams will also work with Stone to develop new creative opportunities as well as to exploit her works in film, TV, advertising and other media worldwide.
